analysis.description: HTHToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/32/0xe15ca699d0c788c783b6d165853c0a0474c8ec59.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/32/0xe15ca699d0c788c783b6d165853c0a0474c8ec59.sol:
	Contract HTHToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/32/0xe15ca699d0c788c783b6d165853c0a0474c8ec59.sol#152-154)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

HTHToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/32/0xe15ca699d0c788c783b6d165853c0a0474c8ec59.sol#224-228) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/32/0xe15ca699d0c788c783b6d165853c0a0474c8ec59.sol#227)

HTHToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/32/0xe15ca699d0c788c783b6d165853c0a0474c8ec59.sol)
